feature_description: Identifies the general zoning classification of the sale.
Linear feet of street connected to property
Type of road access to property
Type of alley access to property
E.g. indide lot, corner lot, Cul-de-sac, etc.
Physical locations within Ames city limits
Proximity to various conditions, like parks or railroads
Proximity to various conditions (if more than one is present)
Type of dwelling (single family, duplex, townhouse, etc.)
Style of dwelling (1 story, 2 story, etc.)
Rates the overall material and finish of the house
Rates the overall condition of the house
Remodel date (same as construction date if no remodeling or additions)
Exterior covering on house (if more than one material)
Masonry veneer area in square feet
Evaluates the quality of the material on the exterior
Evaluates the present condition of the material on the exterior
Height of the basement in inches
Evaluates the general condition of the basement
Refers to walkout or garden level walls
Rating of basement finished area (if multiple types)
Unfinished square feet of basement are
Total square feet of basement area
Low quality finished square feet (all floors)
Above grade (ground) living area square feet
Bedrooms above grade (does NOT include basement bedrooms)
Total rooms above grade (does not include bathrooms)
Home functionality (Assume typical unless deductions are warranted)
Year garage was built (same as year the house was built if no garage)
Size of garage in car capacity
Size of garage in square feet
Paved, partial pavement, or dirt driveway
Wood deck area in square feet
Open porch area in square feet
Enclosed porch area in square feet
Three season porch area in square feet
Screen porch area in square feet
Miscellaneous feature not covered in other categories
